testcase.name: Successfully create an account with default balance
testcase.system-out: Given I create an account with CBU 123456789................................passed Then The account balance should be 0.0......................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully create an account with an initial balance
testcase.system-out: Given I create an account with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 500.0.........passed Then The account balance should be 500.0....................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully deposit money into an account
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0.................passed When I deposit 200.0 into the account.......................................passed Then The account balance should be 1200.0...................................passed

testcase.name: Cannot deposit a negative amount
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0.................passed When I try to deposit -100.0 into the account...............................passed Then The operation should be denied for negative amount.....................passed And The account balance should remain 1000.0................................passed

testcase.classname: Register a client in the Banking System
testcase.name: A customer is successfully registered
testcase.system-out: Given client register his data (last name, first name, date of birth and address) with DNI "42657569" in the bank.passed Then the client with DNI "42657569" is in the System........................passed

testcase.classname: Register a client in the Banking System
testcase.name: Unable to register the customer for invalid DNI
testcase.system-out: Given client try to register his data and puts an invalid DNI "123456"......passed Then the operation should be denied for invalid DNI.........................passed And the client with DNI "123456" is not in the System.......................passed

testcase.classname: Register a client in the Banking System
testcase.name: Unable to register the customer by DNI already registered in the bank
testcase.system-out: Given client try to register his data and put in a DNI "42657569" already registered in the banking system.passed Then the operation shoul be denied due to there is already a client registered with that DNI.passed And the client is not replaced in the system................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully transfer money from a account to other account using CBU
testcase.system-out: Given An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0 and other account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 300.0.passed When account A transfer 200.0 to account B using CBU........................passed Then The account A balance should be 800.0..................................passed And The account B balance should be 500.0...................................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer more money than available balance
testcase.system-out: Given An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 250.0 and other account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 400.0.passed When account A try to transfer 300.0 to account B using CBU.................passed Then The operation should be denied due to lack of funds in the account A...passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer a negative amount
testcase.system-out: Given An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1900.0 and other account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 1100.0.passed When account A try to transfer -500 to account B using CBU..................passed Then The operation should be denied for negative amount.....................passed And The account A balance should be 1900.0..................................passed And The account B balance should be 1100.0..................................passed

testcase.name: Failed transfer due to nonexistent CBU
testcase.system-out: Given An account A with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 400.0, an account B with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 1000.0 and a nonexistent CBU.passed When account A try to transfer 300.0 to account B but enter a nonexistent CBU.passed Then The operation should be denied for entering a non-existent CBU.........passed And The account A balance should be 400.0...................................passed And The account B balance should be 1000.0..................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully transfer money from a account to other account using Alias
testcase.system-out: Given An account A with alias "uno.dos.tres" and a balance of 600.0 and other account B with alias "tres.dos.uno" and a balance of 800.0.passed When account A transfer 350.0 to account B using alias......................passed Then The account A balance should be 250.0..................................passed And The account B balance should be 1150.0..................................passed

testcase.name: Failed transfer due to nonexistent Alias
testcase.system-out: Given An account A with alias "uno.dos.tres" and a balance of 960.0, an account B with alias "tres.dos.uno" and a balance of 1230.0 and a nonexistent Alias.passed When account A try to transfer 300.0 to account B but enter a nonexistent Alias.passed Then The operation should be denied for entering a non-existent Alias.......passed And The account A balance should be 960.0...................................passed And The account B balance should be 1230.0..................................passed

testcase.name: Sender account cannot transfer if it isn't registered
testcase.system-out: Given an unregistered account A with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 800.0 and other account B with CBU 123456789.passed When account A transfer 700.0 to account B..................................passed Then The operation should be denied for pending account to be registered....passed And The account A balance should be 800.0...................................passed And The account B balance should be 0.0.....................................passed

testcase.name: Receiver account cannot receive a transferring if it isn't registered
testcase.system-out: Given an account A with CBU 987654321 and a balance of 900.0 and an unregistered account B with CBU 123456789.passed When account A transfer 150.0 to account B..................................passed Then The operation should be denied for pending account to be registered....passed And The account A balance should be 900.0...................................passed And The account B balance should be 0.0.....................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully withdraw money when the balance is sufficient
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0.................passed When I withdraw 300.0 from the account......................................passed Then The account balance should be 700.0....................................passed

testcase.name: Cannot withdraw more money than available balance
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789 and a balance of 1000.0.................passed When I try to withdraw 1100.0 from the account..............................passed Then The operation should be denied due to insufficient funds...............passed And The account balance should remain 1000.0................................passed
